structure.unit: ARTICLE LII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON GROUND TRANSPORTATION REGULATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-583. Meetings.
The committee is further authorized to meet as often as it deems appropriate. All committee members shall comply with the "government in the sunshine" requirements of Chapter 286, Florida Statutes, and all materials received or generated by the committee in carrying out its responsibilities are "public records" pursuant to Chapter 119, Florida Statutes.
